Class ProfileController

java.lang.Object
com.lucas.ticketsalesmanager.views.controllers.scenes.ProfileController
public class ProfileController extends Object
Controller for managing the user's profile. This controller allows users to view and edit their personal information, as well as manage their ticket status (cancelling or reactivating tickets).
  • Displays and allows modification of user profile information (name, CPF, email, login, and password).
  • Handles ticket management by allowing users to cancel or reactivate tickets.
  • Handles actions like saving and editing profile details, and cancelling or reactivating tickets from a table view.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProfileController

      public ProfileController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the profile controller by setting up necessary controllers, configuring the ticket table columns, and loading the user's profile data.

    • loadUserProfile

      public void loadUserProfile(User user)
      Loads the user's profile information and populates the profile fields and ticket list.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose profile information is to be loaded.

    • fillUserInfo

      public void fillUserInfo(User user)
      Fills the profile fields with the provided user's information.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose information is to be filled in the fields.

    • handleCancel

      public void handleCancel()
      Handles the action when the user cancels the profile editing. Resets the fields to the original user data and makes the fields non-editable.

    • handleSave

      public void handleSave()
      Handles the action when the user saves the changes made to their profile. Updates the user profile with the new data and displays a success or error message.

    • handleEdit

      public void handleEdit()
      Handles the action when the user clicks the "Edit" button. Makes the profile fields editable for the user to modify.

    • setEditableTextField

      public void setEditableTextField(boolean editable)
      Sets whether the profile fields are editable or not.
      Parameters:
      editable - Boolean value indicating whether the fields should be editable.

    • handleCancelTicket

      public void handleCancelTicket()
      Handles the action when the user clicks the "Cancel Ticket" button. Cancels the selected ticket and displays a success or error message.

    • handleReactiveTicket

      public void handleReactiveTicket()
      Handles the action when the user clicks the "Reactive Ticket" button. Reactivates the selected ticket and displays a success or error message.
